item.title: Themecustomizers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column lg="4" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ]

THEME CUSTOMIZERS

Ever since weve been making WordPress themes weve been getting requests for customizations. These varied from very small code tweaks to complete overhauls. Weve never taken on any of these projects because it simply wasnt our focus. However, the requests kept coming. Clearly our customers needed someone to help them out with the more advanced customizations. And so Theme Customizers was born. [/column] [column lg="8" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ] [/column] [/row]

item.title: WordPress Themes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [row] [column lg="8" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ] [/column] [column lg="3" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ] WORDPRESS THEMES We started making WordPress themes back in 2010, and we really liked it. In 2011 we met a developer from Budapest whos now a good friend and a valuable part of our team. More people, more joy! In 2012 weve decided to focus entirely on the theming business, its so much fun and exciting to serve people WordPress themes. [/column] [/row]

item.title: Founder pictures
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column lg="3" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" lgoff="3" ]

PatrickCohen

Patrick is a full focused designer and UI lover. When he's at the office he loves to explore the outer regions of design. Things just gotta look pretty.

Squash, running, dancing and a Beer.

[/column] [column lg="3" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" lgoff="0" ]

LarsWienbelt

Lars is an allround comrad, loves design, experimental coding and happy customiers. When he's at the office he just loves to test new stuff. Things just gotta work.

Squash, running, gaming, DnB and whiskey.

[/column] [/row]

item.title: The No.1 restaurant topseller
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Discover the most popular Restaurant WordPress Theme on Themeforest.

This Wordpress theme is a slick and highly customizable theme for restaurants and anything alike. Change colors with a colorpicker, simply switch the layout and add your own sliding menucard to impress your customers! This theme can quickly be turned into an eCommerce website thanks to the build-in Cart66 plugin support.

item.title: Restaurant image
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The No.1 restaurant topseller

item.title: The restaurant features
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ]

Features

  • Unlimited colorsto pick with the colorpicker in the theme settings
  • Fully editable PSD file
  • Admin panel with a ton of options and tabs for easy navigation
  • 33 fonts included!
  • Move the sidebar to the left, right, or remove it entirely to have full width content (global or page specific)
  • Create your own sidebars and assign them to any page you want
  • Three text widgets on the frontpage for custom content
  • Three custom page templates:
    • Blog/news page
    • Sliding menu card pageto show off your products with price and description! Multiple menucards are now possible!
    • Gallery page
  • Shortcodes:
    • Buttons
    • Columns
    • Seperation lines
    • Toggled content
    • Google maps
    • Notification boxes
    • Selections
  • Plugin support:
    • Cart66 ecommerce plugin
    • Contact form 7
[/column] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ]    
  • Widgets
    • Line seperation widget
    • Latest tweet widget
    • Google maps widget
    • Latest post widget
    • Featured image widget
  • Footer widgets
  • Threaded comments
  • Fancybox integration
  • Easily adding Google analytics
  • Nivo jQuery slider (Customizable in themesettings)
  • Choose between 8 slideshow effects, or set at random
  • Breadcrumbs for increased usability (can be turned off)
  • Option for compressionless images: beautiful, but bigger in file size (can be turned off)
  • Use your own favicon and logo
  • Cross Browser Compatibility
  • CSS Layout (tableless design)
  • Uses the power of google fonts!
  • Coded with SEO in mind
[/column] [/row]

item.title: Vacation Rental image

item.content:encoded: The Ultimate Vacation Rental Solution

item.title: Buy the vacation rental
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Click here to get the vacation rental now!

item.title: Vacation rental
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The perfect solution for your Vacation Rental Business!

The Vacation Rental is the perfect theme for anyone renting out an apartment or house. It has a special apartment filter page with side or top filter. The apartment page has a special booking form with integrated availability calendar, full customizable list of details and an agent contact form. It will alow you to show off your apartments in all its glory. Weve also added a special booking page with optional PayPal integration to complete this theme.

item.title: The vacation rental features
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ]

Features

  • 1140 grid We use the 1140 grid to give you more space for content while still fitting all the most used resolutions
  • Coded with SEO in mind
  • Responsive This theme is responsive to maintain the accessibility and readability of the content on lower resulutions, but also on tablets and mobile phones!
  • XML with dummy content available on the support forums!
  • Pick your own colors Pick any color with the colorpicker in the theme settings
  • Google fonts Use any of the available google fonts for the titles and body text
  • Moveable sidebars Move the sidebar to the left, the right, or hide it entirely for a fullwidth page or post! (global or page/post specific).
  • Custom sidebars Create your own sidebars and assign them to any page you want
  • Maxmium image quality Made with optimal image quality in mind. We prevent wordpress from using jpeg image compression! Bye bye fuzzy images!
  • Custom page templates
    • Apartment list
    • Apartment filter
    • Apartment search on map
    • Apartment pages
    • Blog page
    • Agent list
    • Agent page
    • Booking page
  • Custom widgets
    • Contact widget
    • Latest post widget
    • Google maps widget
    • Twitter widget
  • Multiple shortcodes
    • Image slider
    • Buttons
    • Google maps
    • Lines
    • Post slider
    • Post list
    • Columns
    • Highlighted text
    • Message boxes
    • Toggled content
  • Google analytics Easily adding Google analytics via the theme settings
  • Integrated social sharing Can be turned off
  • Use your own logo and favicon Using the default wordpress easy upload form
  • Contact form 7 plugin support This theme includes styling for the Contact 7 contact form plugin!
  • Custom admin panel Admin panel with a ton of options and tabs for easy navigation
  • Cross Browser Compatibility
  • Fully editable PSD files
[/column] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ] [slider interval="3000"] [slide title="Frontpage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/02/frontpage.png" active="active"/] [slide title="List" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/03_propertylist.png"/] [slide title="Filter" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/04_propertyfilter.png"/] [slide title="Map" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/06_propertymaphalf.png"/] [slide title="Propertypage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/07_propertypage.png"/] [slide title="Bookingpage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/08_bookingpage.png"/] [slide title="Agents" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/09_agentlist.png"/] [slide title="News" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/11_newslist.png"/] [slide title="Newspost" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/12_newspost.png"/] [slide title="Shortcode" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/13_shortcodes.png"/] [slide title="Title"/] [/slider] [/column] [/row]

item.title: The responsive Beauty Salon Theme
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded:
The Responsive Beauty Salon Theme

The Beauty Salon is created for anyone looking to start their own beauty or healthcare website. This premium theme includes a couple of advanced features such as atiled product/services pagewith an easy to use tile-builder.

item.title: A classic restaurant solution
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded:
Start your restaurant website in ease!

The Restaurant: Classic Edition is created for anyone looking to start their own restaurant website. This premium theme includes a couple of advanced features such as abeautyful sliding menucardwith an easy-to-use menucard builder. You can make as many different menucards as you want!

  • Google fonts Use any of the available google fonts for the titles and body text

  • Moveable sidebars Move the sidebar to the left, the right, or hide it entirely for a fullwidth page or post! (global or page/post specific).
  • Custom sidebars Create your own sidebars and assign them to any page you want

    • Gallery

item.title: Swerve image
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded: The minimalistic experience

item.title: Buy swerve
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded: Click here to get swerve now!

item.title: A minimalistic solution
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded:
Start your portfolio in minimalistic style

Swerve is a clean and minimalistic wordpress theme. Packed with options and focussing on the content instead of the gimmicks. Make use of the many build-in widgets and shortcodes, combined with unlimited sidebars and color settings. Explore the options, you wont be disappointed!

item.title: Swerve features
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ]

Features

  • iPhone / iPod / iPad compatible!
  • Unlimited colors to pick with the colorpicker in the theme settings
  • Use one of the 32 fonts a (powered by google)
  • Custom frontpage: Slider and tagline can be removed. Everything below that is a widget area for maximum freedom (also with custom full width widgets)
  • Move the sidebar to the left, right, or remove it entirely to have full width content (global or page specific)
  • Create your own sidebars and assign them to any page you want (both on the side and at the bottom)
  • Made with optimal image quality in mind (no default wordpress image compression!)
  • Custom page templates:
    • Portfolio view (3 layouts)
    • Blog view
  • Custom widgets:
    • Contact widget
    • Featured image widget
    • Latest post widget (full width)
    • Google maps widget
    • Portfolio widget (full witdth)
    • Variable text widget (optional full width)
    • Twitter widget
  • Different shortcodes for:
    • Lines
    • Columns
    • Text selections
    • Buttons
    • Toggled content
    • Message boxes
    • Google maps
  • Tagline can be set per page or post
  • Easily adding Google analytics
  • Nivo jQuery slider on frontpage (Customizable in themesettings, can be turned off)
  • Choose between 8 slideshow effects, or set at random
  • Integrated social sharing (can be turned off)
  • Use your own favicon and logo (with simple upload form)
  • Admin panel with a ton of options and tabs for easy navigation
  • Easily adjustable due to minimalistic design and code (with commented sections)
  • Cross Browser Compatibility
  • CSS Layout (tableless design)
  • Coded with SEO in mind
  • Fully editable PSD file
[/column] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ] [slider] [slide title="Frontpage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/02_swerve_frontpage_2.png" active="active"/] [slide title="Frontpage 2" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/02_swerve_frontpage.png"/] [slide title="Shorcodes" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/03_swerve_shortcodes.png"/] [slide title="Portfolio" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/04_swerve_portfolio.png"/] [slide title="Portfolio" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/05_swerve_portfolio.png"/] [slide title="Portfolio" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/06_swerve_portfolio.png"/] [slide title="Blog" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/07_swerve_blog.png"/] [slide title="Blogpost" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/08_swerve_blogpost.png"/] [slide title="Contact" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/09_swerve_contact.png"/] [slide title="Title"/] [/slider] [/column] [/row]

item.title: An awesome magento solution
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded:
The awesome magento solution

Awesomeis the nextgen multipurpose Magento theme brought to you by Red Factory! This theme is easy to set up thanks to an installation wizard. Set up your website in minutes! Weve set up four different demos for you to explore. You can choose any of these layouts or any combination you like. If you have any questions, feel free to ask!

item.title: A neat Beauty Salon Theme
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded:
A neat beauty salon theme

The Beauty Salon is created for anyone looking to start their on beauty or healthcare website. This premium theme includes a couple of advanced features such as asliding menucardwith an easy to use menucard buider and atiled gallery pagefor treatments, products and services. Weve made it very easy for you tomash together different kind of pages. Imagine adding galleries, product pages and blogs to any page you want!

item.title: The beauty salon features
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ]

Features

  • 1140 grid We use the 1140 grid to give you more space for content while still fitting all the most used resolutions
  • Coded with SEO in mind
  • Responsive This theme is responsive to maintain the accessibility and readability of the content on lower resulutions, but also on tablets and mobile phones!
  • XML with dummy content available on the support forums!
  • Shortcode generator Add shortcodes with great ease with the build-in shortcode generator!
  • Column manager You can use this simple column manager to set up you column layout, and use the visual editor to fill out these columns!
  • Pick your own colors Pick any color with the colorpicker in the theme settings
  • Google fonts Use any of the available google fonts for the titles and body text
  • Page mashups Put together any pages you want. Imagine inclunding a gallery, product page or blog page!
  • Moveable sidebars Move the sidebar to the left, the right, or hide it entirely for a fullwidth page or post! (global or page/post specific).
  • Custom sidebars Create your own sidebars and assign them to any page you want
  • Maxmium image quality Made with optimal image quality in mind. We prevent wordpress from using jpeg image compression! Bye bye fuzzy images!
  • Custom page templates
    • Gallery view (two, three and four column layouts)
    • Post list view (Large image, small image or no image)
    • Product page view (with special product item page)
  • Custom widgets
    • Contact widget
    • Latest post widget
    • Google maps widget
    • Twitter widget
  • Multiple shortcodes
    • Image slider
    • Buttons
    • Google maps
    • Lines
    • Tiles
    • Tabs
    • Post slider
    • Post list
    • Columns
    • Highlighted text
    • Message boxes
    • Toggled content
    • Developer shortcodes
  • Google analytics Easily adding Google analytics via the theme settings
  • Integrated social sharing Can be turned off
  • Use your own logo and favicon Using the default wordpress easy upload form
  • Contact form 7 support This theme includes styling for the Contact 7 contact form plugin!
  • Custom admin panel Admin panel with a ton of options and tabs for easy navigation
  • Cross Browser Compatibility
  • Fully editable PSD files
[/column] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ] [slider] [slide title="Frontpage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/02_frontpage1.png" active="active"/] [slide title="Productpage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/03_productpage.png"/] [slide title="Productpost" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/04_productpost.png"/] [slide title="Gallery" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/05_gallerypage.png"/] [slide title="Blogpage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/06_blogpage.png"/] [slide title="Blogpost" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/07_blogpost.png"/] [/slider] [/column] [/row]

item.title: The beauty salon features
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ]

Features

  • 100% Fully Responsive This theme usesTwitter Bootstrapas a strong foundation. This means the theme is fully responsive and scales down beautifully on any device!
  • Twitter Bootstrap Support Since this theme is build on Twitter Bootstrap you can make use of all its powerful features right out of the box! To make this even easier you can use plugins that give you easy-to-use shortcodes to use all these features on your website.
    • Progress bars
    • Toggles
    • Tabs
    • Lists
    • Buttons
    • Notifications
    • Columns
    • Responsive tables
    • Tooltips
    • Content panels
    • Popovers
    • Dropdowns
    • Labels
    • Icons (Glyphicons)
    • Image effects
  • Retina ready This theme is absolutely future-proof with support for retina displays.
  • Fullwidth design This theme is designed to be viewed in fullwidth, making perfect use of the screen space. Content pages are columned to make the text more readable.
  • Coded with SEO in mind
  • XML with dummy content available in the download package!
  • Pick your own colors Pick any color with the colorpicker in the theme settings
  • Google fonts Use any google font you want for this theme. You can even use other font sources!
  • Flex Slider Integrated Flex Slider in the header, showing images with a title and subtitle.
  • css3 Animations
  • Maxmium image quality Made with optimal image quality in mind. We prevent wordpress from using jpeg image compression! Bye bye fuzzy images!
  • Custom page templates
    • Tile page The tile page is perfect for displaying services, products or plain text. Also has the option to use a filter.
    • Contact page The contact page has an integrated google maps and is perfect to be used with a contact form.
  • Footer image gallery The footer has an integrated image gallery that increases the aesthetics of your website in an easy and beautiful way.
  • Google analytics Easily adding Google analytics via the theme settings
  • Integrated social sharing Can be turned off
  • Use your own logo and favicon Using the default wordpress easy upload form
  • Contact form 7 support This theme includes styling for the Contact 7 contact form plugin!
  • Custom admin panel Admin panel with a ton of options and tabs for easy navigation
  • Cross Browser Compatibility
  • Fully editable PSD files
[/column] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ] [slider] [slide title="Frontpage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/frontpage.png" active="active"/] [slide title="Productview" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/product_view.png"/] [slide title="Product overview" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/product_overview.png"/] [slide title="Product list" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/product_overview_list.png"/] [slide title="Product contact" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/product_contact.png"/] [slide title="Product blogpost" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/product_blogpost.png"/] [slide title="Product blog" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/product_blog.png"/] [/slider] [/column] [/row]

item.title: The vineyard features
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded:
[row] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ]

Features

  • We use the 1140 grid to give you more space for content while still fitting all the most used resolutions
  • Coded with SEO in mind
  • XML with dummy content available on the support forums!
  • Unlimited colors to pick with the colorpicker in the theme settings
  • Use one of the many available google fonts for the titles and body text
  • Custom frontpage: The frontpage consists of a slider, two pages, and a latest product section
  • The slider has a background, with another content layer in front of it. This allows you to place products on any background you want!
  • Move the sidebar to the left, the right, or hide it entirely for a fullwidth page! (global or page specific)
  • Create your own sidebars and assign them to any page you want
  • Made with optimal image quality in mind (no default wordpress image compression!)
  • Custom page templates:
    • Gallery view (two, three and four column layouts)
    • Blog view
    • Store page
  • Special product page design
  • Custom widgets:
    • Product categories
    • Contact widget
    • Featured image widget
    • Latest post widget
    • Google maps widget
    • Twitter widget
  • Different shortcodes for:
    • Lines
    • Columns
    • Text selections
    • Buttons
    • Message boxes
    • Google maps
  • Easily adding Google analytics via the theme settings
  • Integrated social sharing (can be turned off individually)
  • Use your own favicon and logo (with simple upload form)
  • Admin panel with a ton of options and tabs for easy navigation
  • Cross Browser Compatibility
  • CSS Layout (tableless design)
  • Fully editable PSD file
[/column] [column lg="6" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" ] [slider] [slide title="Frontpage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/02_frontpage2.png" active="active"/] [slide title="Cart" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/03_cart_vineyard.png"/] [slide title="Store" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/04_storepage_vineyard.png"/] [slide title="Gallery" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/05_gallery_vineyard.png"/] [slide title="Productpage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/06_productpage_vineyard.png"/] [slide title="Contactpage" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/07_contactpage_vineyard.png"/] [slide title="Shortcode" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/09_shortcodes_vineyard.png"/] [slide title="Blog" image="http://www.redfactory.nl/themes/thecompany-redfactory/files/2014/03/08_blog_vineyard.png"/] [/slider] [/column] [/row]

item.title: The Vineyard Theme
item.dc:creator: woocommerce
item.content:encoded:
The Perfect Vineyard Theme

The Vineyard is a complete, flexable and beautiful eCommerce WordPress theme. The specificly designed store pages will show off your products perfectly. It fully supports the cart66 plugin for a complete webshop experience. Packed with options, custom widgets and shortcodes, this theme will not dissapoint!

item.content:encoded: Click here to get the vineyard now!
